title: Update regarding Quantum Compute
story_body:
Quantum Compute (QNTM) has announced several updates in its latest corporate disclosure.

As of 08:00 EST, March 10, 2023, Quantum Compute confirmed the appointment of Rachel Lee as Vice President of Marketing, effective immediately. Lee will oversee the company's global marketing efforts and report directly to the Chief Executive Officer.

In a separate statement, Quantum Compute revealed that it has launched a new website, quantumcompute.com, as part of its ongoing branding efforts. The new website aims to provide improved user experience and easier access to company information.

Additionally, Quantum Compute disclosed its 2022 Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG) report, detailing the company's progress on sustainability and social responsibility initiatives. The report highlights Quantum Compute's efforts to reduce energy consumption, increase diversity in the workforce, and promote community engagement.

The report is available on the company's website and provides a comprehensive overview of its ESG performance during the calendar year 2022. No significant updates or changes were reported in the company's operations or financial position.
